text: Miguel Hernández Agosto (April 5, 1927 – March 18, 2016) was a Puerto Rican politician. He worked with the Popular Democratic Party (PPD). He started his political career as a Cabinet member, but eventually became a Senator at- large. Hernández Agosto served as President of the Senate of Puerto Rico for 12 years (1981-1993). Agosto died in San Juan, Puerto Rico on March 18, 2016 at the age of 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Biography from the Senate of Puerto Rico Category:1927 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Puerto Rican politicians
title: Miguel Hernández Agosto
